settings.title: Service Guarantee
settings.description: Your smile is our priority and we provide all-around service to bring you great shopping experience. We will always keep doing better both on service and product.

settings.title: Bee Adventurer
settings.subtitle: Unlock Your Adventures Anywhere
settings.description: Bee Adventurer is one of our best equipped all-terrain electric bikes. The Bike is equipped with a 48V 21Ah Lithium-ion Battery, which gives the bike a long travel distance over 82 miles per charge on pedal-assist mode and 50 miles on throttle power mode. The continuous 750W motor and 4’’ fat tires lets the bike have maximum power to overcome any kinds of terrible terrain: soft sands, thick grass, heavy rain, slippery snow surface, steep rocks face. Our dual suspension system will bring you the max comfort.

settings.title: Bee Explorer
settings.subtitle: A Cozy Exploring on All Terrains
settings.description: Bee Explorer is a sporty, energetic and fashion all-terrain fat tire electric bikes. With the bright and beautiful colors, plus more streamlined design, Bee Explorer became more popular among fashion insiders. The Bike is equipped with a 48V 21Ah Lithium-ion Battery, which gives the bike a long travel distance over 82 miles per charge on pedal-assist mode and 50 miles on throttle power mode. The continuous 750W motor and 4’’ fat tires let the bike have maximum power to overcome any kinds of terrible terrains: soft sands, thick grass, heavy rain, slippery snow surface, steep rocks face. Our dual suspension system will bring you the max comfort.

settings.title: Bee Pathfinder
settings.subtitle: Your Well-Equipped Off-Road Mate
settings.description: From the outside in, Bee Pathfinder is well designed to boost the comfort with an adjustable hydraulic front fork and seat suspension and better aesthetic design with Crater-Free welding technology leaving no welding scars on the frames of the bike, making your bike eye-catching on the streets. Moreover, we’ve equipped it with 180mm hydraulic disc brakes and 26” X4” fat tires for greater stopping power and all terrains, an easily removable built-in battery, and an intuitive user interface with a colored LCD screen that makes operating your bike a breeze. Inside it, it has a strong heart, a 48V 20Ah Lithium-ion Battery, which gives the bike a long range from 50 miles to 82 miles.

settings.title: Bee Pathfinder Step-thru
settings.subtitle: Easy On, Easy Go
settings.description: Bee Pathfinder Step-thru has a lower step-through height to fit more riders and it has the same design as Bee Pathfinder to boost the comfort with an adjustable hydraulic front fork and seat suspension and better aesthetic design with Crater-Free welding technology leaving no welding scars on the frames of the bike, making your bike eye-catching on the streets. Moreover, we’ve equipped it with 180mm hydraulic disc brakes and 26” X4” fat tires for greater stopping power and all terrains, an easily removable built-in battery, and an intuitive user interface with a colored LCD screen that makes operating your bike a breeze. Inside it, it has a strong heart, a 48V 20Ah Lithium-ion Battery, which gives the bike a long range from 50 miles to 82 miles.

settings.title: Bee Challenger
settings.subtitle: Ultra Powerful and Durable Beast
settings.description: Bee Challenger is the latest advancement of our fat tire models and will provide you with a next-level riding experience. Get an amazing range of 80 miles to 110 miles with a historic 48V 30Ah large capacity Lithium-ion Battery, better-showing interface with the color display which will please your eyes, better-stopping power with high-performance 180mm hydraulic disc brakes, and double shoulder adjustable hydraulic front fork and dual rear suspension, making your journey as comfortable and exciting as possible. Now ride on the beast to be a challenger and enjoy the thrill and comfort.

settings.title: Bee Rambler
settings.subtitle: Pure Cruising Pleasure
settings.description: As the first moped-style electric bike by BeeCool, we put a lot of effort into it. From design to details, Bee Rambler shows well our technicians’ minds. First, with an adjustable hydraulic front fork and rear suspension, we want to bring you much comfort on the road. Next, we’ve also equipped it with 180mm hydraulic disc brakes and 20” X4” fat tires for greater stopping power to help you conquer more terrains and make your journey safer. Moreover, we put a strong heart in it with the 750W geared hub motor and 48V 21Ah Lithium-ion Battery to guarantee you a long durable range from 50 miles to 82 miles together with a 3A charger to release you from long waiting and leave you more time on the road.

settings.text: I bought this Beecool Explorer in late July and was delivered in August 12th after I called and switch the color to Red instead of Orange because it's a stock item. I had a minor issue with the code 02 after installation. The customer service advised that I needed to adjust the screw on the break lever of the one that affected which I did and it worked. I am very happy with the Red color and the performance of the Beecool Explorer.
settings.text_mobile: I bought this Beecool Explorer in late July and was delivered in August 12th after I called and switch the color to Red instead of Orange because it's a stock item. I had a minor issue with the code 02 after installation. The customer service advised that I needed to adjust the screw on the break lever of the one that affected which I did and it worked. I am very happy with the Red color and the performance of the Beecool Explorer.

settings.text: Received the bike on time in perfect condition. This ebike is a game changer for me. I live in the mountains and bicycling had become too difficult. Now I can continue to get the pain free exercise I need with help when I need it. The Explorer was the right choice for me with my 28” inseam. It does everything I’d hoped it would do for me. I am excited to bicycle again!
settings.text_mobile: Received the bike on time in perfect condition. This ebike is a game changer for me. I live in the mountains and bicycling had become too difficult. Now I can continue to get the pain free exercise I need with help when I need it. The Explorer was the right choice for me with my 28” inseam. It does everything I’d hoped it would do for me. I am excited to bicycle again!

settings.text: I bought two Bee Cool Explorer bikes. My wife and I have rode them about 70 miles without any problems. I am very happy with the bikes so far. Shipping does take awhile.
settings.text_mobile: I bought two Bee Cool Explorer bikes. My wife and I have rode them about 70 miles without any problems. I am very happy with the bikes so far. Shipping does take awhile.

settings.text: Fantastic bike. 140 miles with around 40 off road. Only problem was I could not get the key out of the battery then it fell out on its own and I lost it. Last week I requested a new key. Have not heard back. I’ll update this when/if I hear back
settings.text_mobile: Fantastic bike. 140 miles with around 40 off road. Only problem was I could not get the key out of the battery then it fell out on its own and I lost it. Last week I requested a new key. Have not heard back. I’ll update this when/if I hear back

settings.text: I couldn’t be happier with my explorer. I do notice that I need an extender to raise the handle bar and bring it closer to me for a more comfortable ride. Which extender should I get and where should I buy it. Be cool bike handlebar extenders are not available and won’t be for three months. Please help with Amazon recommendation.

settings.text: I just received my bike today. Only a couple of little scratches no big deal. I absolutely love this bike. It’s very fun to ride everyone one just loved the looked of it. Don’t be afraid to order one for yourself.
settings.text_mobile: I just received my bike today. Only a couple of little scratches no big deal. I absolutely love this bike. It’s very fun to ride everyone one just loved the looked of it. Don’t be afraid to order one for yourself.

settings.text: My explorer arrived in Massachusetts today undamaged. The box was in great shape. The only issue is that the battery was out of power. Looking forward to taking it out for a spin!
settings.text_mobile: My explorer arrived in Massachusetts today undamaged. The box was in great shape. The only issue is that the battery was out of power. Looking forward to taking it out for a spin!

settings.text: This is a nice machine! At 5’10” 190lbs and 63yo getting on the Adventurer must be done carefully. But getting on is well worth it. Good power, It handles very well. Front and rear shocks give comfortable ride. The hydraulic brakes work great. With a quick and easy adjustment the gears are smooth as silk. If you think you might like a large , well built ebike ….I’m betting like me, you will love it!
settings.text_mobile: This is a nice machine! At 5’10” 190lbs and 63yo getting on the Adventurer must be done carefully. But getting on is well worth it. Good power, It handles very well. Front and rear shocks give comfortable ride. The hydraulic brakes work great. With a quick and easy adjustment the gears are smooth as silk. If you think you might like a large , well built ebike ….I’m betting like me, you will love it!

settings.text: Just passed 300 miles on my adventurer. A combination of paved roads, dirt roads and off road trails here in New Hampshire. Some I wasn’t sure I or the bike were able to handle. Well the bike has more capabilities than I have abilities. The more I ride the more confidence I have in my new toy. I love it. I am 75 years old, retired and enjoying life. Ken Costello

settings.text: Review for Bee Adventurer Very good e Bike for the price point. Very easy to assemble, good directions and everything for very well. This bike is a beast Fast and handles well.

settings.text: Very nice bike great for work or just recreation. Had to adjust brakes an gears but it's all good now. Nice range. Asking if you guys can make a bigger battery for this bike. Thank you James Urmetz
